Name: Enoteca
Review Text:
This is a must go in Amsterdam. Pleasant and quiet, very different from the city center of Amsterdam
Food is delicious, recommend the "Costata di Vitello" - one of the best steaks …

Name: Enoteca
Review Text:
Went there, because we were staying at the “The Manor” Hotel in the same building and did not feel like you going outside again after a busy day.
The food was decent, but not stellar. Prices are a bit on the high end for what …

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Was here for their special wine tasting and chefs menu. Great service, good stories and good food (awesome risotto). Had some allergie wishes and it went smooth, only had to let them know once. Great :)

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Good high-class Italian restaurant in an up and coming neighborhood called Oost. Is part of the Eden Hotel which is located adjacent to it. Food was good, but not that good that it justifies the hefty price tag. Very extensive wine list.  All if them can be ordered by glass. Nice!

Name: Enoteca
Review Text:
Amazing ! Just the best "tartufo pasta" of my life. Truffle was very taste and the sauce so creamy.
Also, the staff was very smiling and congenial

Name: Enoteca
Review Text:
Cozy restaurant with delicious food and great service! Try the tiramisu, you will not be disappointed.
I can really recommend the place for couples that are celebrating 5 years together.

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Everything you would expect from a neighborhood hotel bar: Some lonely guests, bright lights, decoration that could be Ikea, an absent minded bartender - yet pretty good wines by the generous glass and snacks-.

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Nice food for reasonable price. We could not find a place to eat since everywhere was full, this came very handy andb it was almost empty. I think because it is in the hotel and not very visible from outside.

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Extremely poor service. Took 20 minutes to be acknowledged and a further 20 to be told they had no Coca cola or Peroni. Forgot our bread and mains arrived before the bread did. Overall very disappointing, especially as the prices are so expensuve

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Slow service. Food is ok at best. The beer came in a dirty glass and finally the waitress forgot us when we wanted to order dessert.

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Fancy restaurant. Bit pricey, small portions. But very good food. And the wines are great.

Name: Enoteca
Review Text:
had a amazing time. The service was really good and the best italian food
I had in Amsterdam

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Waitress.veruly friendly bit later on we had to call the waitress and waiter to order things and the place was empty, the wine is not so good, a pity

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Nice food but a bit overpriced for the tiny portions and service wasn't fantastic.

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Just sat for 20 minutes without anyone taking a drink order or serving bread... Slow service is an understatement. Going somewhere else.

Name: Enoteca
Review Text: Great food, fantastic staff! All round thumbs up :-)
